After an intense battle, Australia clinched the series against India with a thrilling last-over victory in the ODI match.
Virat Kohli's century proved pivotal for India, marking his 50th ODI century against Australia.
Australia's pacers dominated the powerplay, reducing India to 29 for 3 after the first 10 overs.
India's bowling attack lacked the usual spark, allowing the Australian batsmen to take control of the middle overs.
The rivalry between India and Australia continues to deliver nail-biting finishes and high-octane performances.
Despite a valiant chase, India fell just short, losing to Australia's calculated bowling strategy in the final overs.
Fans are left questioning the umpiring decisions after a couple of controversial calls favored the Australian side.
The weather in Australia is expected to be sunny, perfect conditions for a cricket match.
